channel.title: Adding a command that
channel.description:
How would i add a command that made everywhere pvp but not a certain place such as edgy bank? like a ::pvp bank that makes wildy everywhere
i have a played a server with this command and im not sure if its a simple command or there is something deeper and more complex
if theres anyone that can help it is much appreciated,
- Lewis.

item.title: Adding a command that
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This is the command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvpall")) {
if(playerRights <= 2) {
return;
}
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client
pvpAll = true;
}
}
}

Declare:

public static boolean pvpAll = false;

Also if you manage to find where booleans are read repeatedly, add this.

if (pvpAll == true) {
nonWild = false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a command that
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

yes it is… hold on. i’m using crazypvp as my source, let me get it for you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 06:05:10 pm[/size][hr]i think this is it, if not let me know.

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordX >= 3158) && (coordX <= 3160) && (coordY >= 9755) && (coordY <=9761) || !((coordX >= 2752) && (coordX <= 2764) && (coordY >= 3493) && (coordY <=3503)) && (coordX >= 2744) && (coordX <= 2774) && (coordY >= 3483) && (coordY <=3519) || (coordX >= 2690) && (coordX <= 2703) && (coordY >= 3459) && (coordY <=3466) || (coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) || (coordY >= 3487) && (coordY <= 3489) && (coordX <= 2727) && (coordX >= 2724)) { return true; } }

it goes into more detail but that’s coords for pvp.

Read full topic
